timeline.title: Traditional Systems
timeline.description: Basic flood irrigation from Jordan River and seasonal wadis, limited to valley regions with natural water sources.

timeline.title: King Abdullah Canal
timeline.description: Major infrastructure project diverting water from Yarmouk River, enabling large-scale irrigation in northern regions.

timeline.title: Drip Irrigation Introduction
timeline.description: Adoption of modern drip systems in greenhouses, revolutionizing water efficiency in vegetable production.

timeline.title: Groundwater Development
timeline.description: Extensive well drilling and groundwater extraction to supplement surface water sources during drought periods.

timeline.title: Smart Irrigation
timeline.description: Introduction of automated systems with soil moisture sensors and weather-based controllers.

timeline.title: Precision Agriculture
timeline.description: GPS-guided irrigation systems and variable rate technology optimizing water use across different soil types.

timeline.title: AI & IoT Integration
timeline.description: Machine learning algorithms predicting irrigation needs, drone monitoring, and real-time water management.
